title: Angel's Mass: A Medieval Ghost Story
description: Historians believe aside from two days in which the great monastic house of Tintern Abbey gave sanctuary to a king fleeing a usurper, nothing of note ever happened there.But they are wrong.In the early hours of Christmas Eve sometime in the 1340s, a man appears to an ordinary monk named Edmund. A man who only Edmund could see and hear.Edmund, find me.Who is the man? What does he want with Edmund? And can Edmund uncover a great mystery that threatens to change the world that Edmund knows and loves?
author: M.G. Mason
